00019                                     LinkedList
00020     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00021 
00024 class LinkedListBase {
00025     public:
00027         LinkedListBase(LinkableBase *elem = 0);
00028 
00030         BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const {
00031             return m_anchor == 0;
00032         }
00033 
00035         INT GetSize() const;
00036 
00038         LinkableBase* GetFront() const {
00039             return m_anchor;
00040         }
00041 
00043         void PushFront(LinkableBase *elem);
00044 
00046         void PopFront();
00047 
00051         LinkableBase* GetBack() const;
00052 
00056         void PushBack(LinkableBase *elem);
00057 
00059         void PopBack();
00060 
00062         void Remove(LinkableBase *elem);
00063 
00068         void Insert(LinkableBase *elem, LinkableBase *after = 0);
00069 
00071         BOOLEAN Contains(LinkableBase *elem) const;
00072 
00073     protected:
00074         LinkableBase *m_anchor;
00075 };
00076 
00079 template<class T> class LinkedList : public LinkedListBase {
00080     typedef LinkedListBase Base;
00081 
00082     public:
00083         LinkedList(T *elem) : Base(elem) {}
00084         LinkedList() : Base(0) {}
00085 
00086         T* GetFront() const {
00087             return (T*)Base::GetFront();
00088         }
00089 };
00090 
00091 
00092 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093                                 SortedLinkedList
00094     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00095 class SortedLinkedListBase : private LinkedListBase {
00096     typedef LinkedListBase Base;
00097 
00098     public:
00099         using Base::IsEmpty;
00100         using Base::GetSize;
00101         using Base::Remove;
00102         using Base::PopFront;
00103         using Base::GetFront;
00104         using Base::Contains;
00105 
00106     protected:
00107         using Base::PushFront;
00108 };
00109 
00111 template<class T> class SortedLinkedList : public SortedLinkedListBase {
00112     typedef SortedLinkedListBase Base;
00113 
00114     public:
00115         T* GetFront() const {
00116             return (T*)Base::GetFront();
00117         }
00118 
00119 
00120         void Insert(T *elem);
00121 };

00125 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126     Insert
00127     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00128 template<class T> void SortedLinkedList<T>::Insert(T *elem) 
00129 {
00130     T *t = (T*)GetFront();
00131     T *prev = 0;
00132 
00133     while(t != 0 && *t < *elem) {
00134         prev = t;
00135         t = (T*)t->GetNext();
00136     }
00137 
00138     if (GetFront() == 0 || prev == 0)
00139         PushFront(elem);
00140     else {
00141         prev->SetNext(elem);
00142         elem->SetNext(t);
00143     }
00144 }   // Insert
